duration_in_months: You must submit your bid before November 28th, 2024 at 2:00 PM
full_summary:
=====================================================

### Title and Langauges

**Title (English):** Nardalert S3 RF Safety Monitor Government Tender Announcement
**Title (French):** [Original title is Moniteur de sécurité RF Nardalert S3; no translation required]

### Tender Information

| Category | Tender Information |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | cb-168-11611057 |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8486-259684/A |
| **Publication Date** | 30 October 2024 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 28 November 2024, 14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 29 November 2024 |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 28 February 2025 |

### Tender Details

The Department of National Defence is currently accepting bids for a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Nardalert S3 RF Safety Monitors (Quantity: 100 units). The requested goods must include a Certificate of Calibration dated no more than 90 days prior to the delivery date.

**Tender Status:** The tender is currently open for bidding.

**Delivery Address:** Montreal, Canada

### Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

### Contact Information

You may reach out to Viktoria Melnichuk at (613) 302-1534 or Viktoria.melnichuk@forces.gc.ca for more information on the tender.

### Documentation

You may find the RFP documents at the following links:

*   English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/50392/w8486-259684-a\_rfp\_eng\_0.pdf
*   French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/50392/w8486-259684-a\_rfp\_fr\_1.pdf
*   Note: All documents can be found on the Canada Buys platform.?
